keyword: how many calories in a crepe
title: How Many Calories Are in a Crepe?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a crepe, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Crepe?
assumptions: Plain French-style crepe, ~60 g, 10-inch diameter, made with wheat flour, milk, eggs, and a touch of butter; no fillings or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, size, ingredients, and cooking method. Check labels or recipes for precision.

quick_answer.text: A plain crepe contains about 130 calories, with 18 g carbs and 5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat flour instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories in a plain crepe?
faqs.a: About 130 kcal for one standard plain crepe.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a crepe?
faqs.a: Around 18 g total carbs, including 1 g fiber and 2 g sugars per crepe.
Moderately; one crepe has about 5 g protein from eggs and milk.

faqs.q: How does filling affect calories in a crepe?
faqs.a: Sweet fillings like Nutella add 100+ kcal; savory ones like ham vary by amount.
Yes, plain versions have ~4 g fat, but butter or oil in cooking can increase it.
